tv.amwa.maj.model

Interface KLVData

  • All Superinterfaces:
    InterchangeObject, MediaEntity, MetadataObject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    KLVDataImpl

    public interface KLVData
extends InterchangeObject

    Specifies a container for user data specified with a key (SMPTE label), length and value. SMPTE KLV's are specified in SMPTE&336M and are 16-bytes long.

    The byte order of the KLV data value is the same as the byte order of the byte buffer passed to initialize or set the value.

    See Also:
    KLVDataDefinition, Component.getComponentKLVData(), Package.getPackageKLVData(), TypeDefinitionOpaque, TypeDefinitions.KLVDataStrongReference, TypeDefinitions.KLVDataStrongReferenceVector

      Returns the key of this KLV data.
      int getLength()
      Returns the size of the data buffer for this KLV data, which includes the key.
      ByteBuffer getValue()
      Returns the value of this KLV data, including the key.
      void setValue(ByteBuffer klvDataValue)

    • Method Detail

      • getKey

        AUID getKey()

        Returns the key of this KLV data.

        Returns:
        Key of the KLV data.

      • getValue

        @DataBuffer
ByteBuffer getValue()

        Returns the value of this KLV data, including the key.

        Returns:
        Value of the KLV data.

      • getLength

        @UInt32
int getLength()

        Returns the size of the data buffer for this KLV data, which includes the key.

        Returns:
        Length of the value of the KLV data.

      • setValue

        void setValue(@DataBuffer
              ByteBuffer klvDataValue)
       throws NullPointerException,
              IllegalArgumentException

        Sets the key and data value of the KLV data from the given byte array. The key is assumed to be the first 16 bytes of the value.

        Parameters:
        klvDataValue - Value to set for the KLV data.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - The given buffer for the data value is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - A buffer is too short. It must contain a key of of 16-bytes.

      • clone

        KLVData clone()

        Create a cloned copy of this KLV data value.

        Specified by:
        clone in interface InterchangeObject
        Specified by:
        clone in interface MediaEntity
        Returns:
        Cloned copy of this KLV data value.
